name: NotificationLog
author: Bluscream
description:
Simple highly customizable `Mod` that logs

- HUD Notifications
- Instance Joins
- Player joins
- Player leaves
- Prop Spawns

to your MelonLoader console and log

name: PublicSafety
author: Bluscream
description:
Simple `Mod` that allows you to auto-set certain settings like

- URL Whitelist
- Advanced Safety
- Discord/Steam Rich Presence

when you join public instances

If you have recommendations on other settings that should be included, leave them on [Github](https://github.com/Bluscream/cvr-mods/issues/new) or [Discord](https://discord.com/users/467777925790564352)

name: PropSpawner
author: Bluscream
description:
Slightly less simple `Mod` that allows you to auto-spawn certain props when you join a instance

Check the [Github Readme](https://github.com/Bluscream/cvr-mods/blob/master/PropSpawner/README.md) for more infos.
